result.title: Project Leaflet and Press Kit
result.description: Coinciding with the release of the FIRE portal we will release a press kit and communication leaflet to fire up the community’s interest in the activities and ensure maximum interest and participation in the dialogue events. A range of presentations, interviews and promotional audio-visual material will be prepared based on the F1 event and FGE meetings. These will be uploaded on the YouTube channel and shown at F2.
